# backgroundImage

**Instance Property**

A background image to display around the button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var backgroundImage: UIImage? { get set }
```

## Configuring the background appearance

- **backgroundImagePositionAdjustment**: The distance, in points, by which to offset the background image horizontally and vertically.

items.description: The distance, in points, by which to offset the background image horizontally and vertically.
